DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open label , parallel group , multi-centre , phase II study progression free survival , compare oral ZD1839 ( IRESSA™ ) ( 250 mg tablet daily ) vinorelbine 30 mg/m2 infusion day 1 8 21-day cycle ) chemonaïve , elderly patient locally advance ( stage IIIB ) metastatic ( stage IV ) non-small cell lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Iressa Versus Vinorelbine ( INVITE )
